choose.when: select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from userqna where mid=#{mid}
choose.otherwise: select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from userqna where mid=#{mid} and qcate=#{category}

choose.when: select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select * from userqna where mid=#{mid} and qstep=0 order by qid desc )aa ) where rnum>=#{startRowNum} and rnum<=#{endRowNum}
choose.otherwise: select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select * from userqna where qcate=#{category} and mid=#{mid} and qstep=0 order by qid desc )aa ) where rnum>=#{startRowNum} and rnum<=#{endRowNum}

mapper.select: select * from ( select * from userqna where qid<#{qid} order by qid desc ) where rownum=1
select * from ( select * from userqna where qid>#{qid} order by qid asc ) where rownum=1
select * from userqna where mid=#{mid} and qid=#{qid}
mapper.update: update userqna set qcate=#{qcate}, qtitle=#{qtitle}, qrdate=sysdate, qcontent=#{qcontent} where mid=#{mid} and qid=#{qid}
